name: Save The Cat in Granny House
name_original: Save The Cat in Granny House
description:
The game will take you to the cozy house of a cute old woman who, by an unfortunate mistake, instilled a demon in her beloved cat with the help of an old book. Now, solving simple puzzles and collecting the necessary items, you need to help send the demon back to hell and return your pet back.

• Short game session 2 - 5 minutes.
• Replayability - items don't stand still.
